trans-unit.source: Specifies the position of tick marks in a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider" /> control with respect to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> that the control implements.
trans-unit.target: Especifica a posição das marcas de escala em um controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider" /> com relação ao <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> implementado pelo controle.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickPlacement> enumeration is used to set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.TickPlacement%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickPlacement> enumeração é usada para definir o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.TickPlacement%2A> propriedade de um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>.

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> that has tick marks that are located below the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>.
trans-unit.target: A ilustração a seguir mostra um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> com marcas de escala que estão localizadas abaixo do <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>.

trans-unit.source: In this example, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.TickPlacement%2A> property is set to BottomRight.
trans-unit.target: Neste exemplo, o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.TickPlacement%2A> está definida como BottomRight.
![Ilustração de controle deslizante](~/add/media/genericslider.png "ilustração de controle deslizante")

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.TickPlacement%2A> property for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.TickPlacement%2A> control.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como definir o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.TickPlacement%2A> propriedade para um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.TickPlacement%2A> controle.

trans-unit.source: Tick marks appear above and below the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> bar for a horizontal <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider" />, or to the left and right of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> for a vertical <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider" />.
trans-unit.target: Marcas de escala são exibidas acima e abaixo da barra <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> de um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider" /> horizontal ou à esquerda e à direita da <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> de um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider" /> vertical.

trans-unit.source: Tick marks appear below the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> for a horizontal <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider" />, or to the right of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> for a vertical <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider" />.
trans-unit.target: Marcas de escala são exibidas abaixo da <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> de um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider" /> horizontal ou à direita da <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> de um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider" /> vertical.
Nenhuma marca de escala é exibida.

trans-unit.source: Tick marks appear above the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> for a horizontal <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider" />, or to the left of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> for a vertical <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider" />.
trans-unit.target: Marcas de escala são exibidas acima da <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> de um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider" /> horizontal ou à esquerda da <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> de um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider" /> vertical.
